name: 7able
overview:
Skill based gaming startup giving away $20,000+ worth of products each month.

Selection of high priced items including:

  • Delux holiday for 2 staying at Burj Al Arab hotel
  • Selection of brand new cars
  • Professional sports training in New Zealand
  • Ultimate Apple Package
  • Around the world trip for 2
  • Professional Home Cinema
  • Professional sound recording at Abbey Roads
  • Â£500 ($770) cash every month for the next 18 months
  • Canon Photographic Equipment Package

Users have several ways to play whether its via our dedicated mobile platforms, HTML 5 website or SMS Gateway.

Users can even play for free by completing 7able challenges, 7able surveys, 7able recommendations and partner deals.

A small but dedicated team giving away the best products currently available across the world.
